description:
Watanabe is a small, delicate boy with brown hair and green eyes and he is shy and retiring.
When he first met his roommate, Fujikake, on a Tokyo train, Fujikake mistook him for a cute girl! Unlike Shun, Watanabe is unhappy with his girlish looks and hopes to become more manly.
He`s the boy who goes to the infirmary for "a small cut". Watanabe is from Hokkaido.
name: Watanabe Yoshiki
